<h1 align="center">
  This is a practice about Content Management with <a href="https://www.contentful.com/">Contentful</a>, <a href="https://www.gatsbyjs.org/">Gatsby</a> and <a href="https://www.netlify.com/">Netlify</a>"
</h1>

## TECH STACKS: 
- Template: HTML/CSS, [React version 16](https://reactjs.org/)
- Build tool: [Gatsby (powered by Graphql)](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/)
- CMS: [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/)
- Deploy service: [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/)

## HOW THEY WORK
![How they work](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ningo-agilityio/jam-stack/blob/master/src/images/gatsby-astronaut.png)

## HOW TO RUN SITE
1. Clone or download source code
```
git clone git@github.com:ningo-agilityio/jam-stack.git
```

2. Change to folder `jam-stack`
```
cd jam-stack
```

3. Install gatsby globally
```
npm install -g gatsby-cli
```

4. Run develop mode
```
gatsby develop
```

5. Run build mode
```
gatsby build
```
